mapper.select: SELECT id AS id, code AS code, waybill_code AS waybillCode, distribution_no AS distributionNo, ticket_no AS ticketNo, goods_name AS goodsName, ttl_weight AS ttlWeight, ttl_weight_unit AS ttlWeightUnit, ttl_volume AS ttlVolume, ttl_volume_unit AS ttlVolumeUnit, ttl_number AS ttlNumber, ttl_number_unit AS ttlNumberUnit, wdc_claim AS wdcClaim, wdh_claim AS wdhClaim, whd_claim AS whdClaim, xps_claim AS xpsClaim, other_claim AS otherClaim, claim_description AS claimDescription, status AS status, custom_data AS customData, ticket_tag AS ticketTag, description AS description, remark AS remark, disabled AS disabled, deleted AS deleted, module_code AS moduleCode, creator_user_code AS creatorUserCode, creator_username AS creatorUsername, create_time AS createTime, update_user_code AS updateUserCode, update_username AS updateUsername, update_time AS updateTime, ip AS ip, operator_longitude AS operatorLongitude, operator_latitude AS operatorLatitude, owner_user_code AS ownerUserCode, owner_org_code AS ownerOrgCode, owner_org_name AS ownerOrgName, synchronous_id AS synchronousId FROM waybill_ticket_detail WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO waybill_ticket_detail ( code, waybill_code, distribution_no, ticket_no, goods_name, ttl_weight, ttl_weight_unit, ttl_volume, ttl_volume_unit, ttl_number, ttl_number_unit, wdc_claim, wdh_claim, whd_claim, xps_claim, other_claim, claim_description, status, custom_data, ticket_tag, description, remark, disabled, deleted, module_code, creator_user_code, creator_username, create_time, update_user_code, update_username, update_time, ip, operator_longitude, operator_latitude, owner_user_code, owner_org_code, owner_org_name, synchronous_id ) VALUES ( #{code}, #{waybillCode}, #{distributionNo}, #{ticketNo}, #{goodsName}, #{ttlWeight}, #{ttlWeightUnit}, #{ttlVolume}, #{ttlVolumeUnit}, #{ttlNumber}, #{ttlNumberUnit}, #{wdcClaim}, #{wdhClaim}, #{whdClaim}, #{xpsClaim}, #{otherClaim}, #{claimDescription}, #{status}, #{customData}, #{ticketTag}, #{description}, #{remark}, #{disabled}, #{deleted}, #{moduleCode}, #{creatorUserCode}, #{creatorUsername}, #{createTime}, #{updateUserCode}, #{updateUsername}, #{updateTime}, #{ip}, #{operatorLongitude}, #{operatorLatitude}, #{ownerUserCode}, #{ownerOrgCode}, #{ownerOrgName}, #{synchronousId} )
mapper.update:
UPDATE waybill_ticket_detail
code = #{code},
waybill_code = #{waybillCode},
distribution_no = #{distributionNo},
ticket_no = #{ticketNo},
goods_name = #{goodsName},
ttl_weight = #{ttlWeight},
ttl_weight_unit = #{ttlWeightUnit},
ttl_volume = #{ttlVolume},
ttl_volume_unit = #{ttlVolumeUnit},
ttl_number = #{ttlNumber},
ttl_number_unit = #{ttlNumberUnit},
wdc_claim = #{wdcClaim},
wdh_claim = #{wdhClaim},
whd_claim = #{whdClaim},
xps_claim = #{xpsClaim},
other_claim = #{otherClaim},
claim_description = #{claimDescription},
status = #{status},
custom_data = #{customData},
ticket_tag = #{ticketTag},
description = #{description},
remark = #{remark},
disabled = #{disabled},
deleted = #{deleted},
module_code = #{moduleCode},
creator_user_code = #{creatorUserCode},
creator_username = #{creatorUsername},
create_time = #{createTime},
update_user_code = #{updateUserCode},
update_username = #{updateUsername},
update_time = #{updateTime},
ip = #{ip},
operator_longitude = #{operatorLongitude},
operator_latitude = #{operatorLatitude},
owner_user_code = #{ownerUserCode},
owner_org_code = #{ownerOrgCode},
owner_org_name = #{ownerOrgName},
synchronous_id = #{synchronousId},
WHERE id = #{id}
